name: Juan Fernando López Aguilar, María Soraya Rodríguez Ramos - Am 10rev
green_remark: Calls on the Member States to recognise sex purchase as a form of violence against women and to criminalise sex purchase in line with the Swedish Equality Model introduced in 1999;
title: Implementation of Directive 2011/36/EU on preventing and combating trafficking in human beings and protecting its victims
